1169456.effect: If this card is Normal or Special Summoned, you can target 1 card on the field; destroy it, then destroy 1 card you control. You can only use this effect of "Meklord Army Attack" once per turn. You can activate the effects of your "Meklord" monsters that would target 1 Synchro Monster your opponent controls targeting this card in your GY instead. A "Meklord" monster equipped with this card can attack twice during each Battle Phase.
1169456.name: Meklord Army Attack

1169458.effect: If this card is destroyed: You can Special Summon 1 "Meklord Army" monster from your Deck or GY, except this card. You can only use this effect of "Meklord Army Carrier" once per turn. You can activate the effects of your "Meklord" monsters that would target 1 Synchro Monster your opponent controls targeting this card in your GY instead. While this card is equipped to a "Meklord" monster, reduce the ATK/DEF of all monsters on the field by half of their original ATK/DEF.
1169458.name: Meklord Army Carrier

1169463.effect: If this card is destroyed: You can add 1 "Meklord" card from your Deck or GY to your hand, except this card. You can only use this effect of "Meklord Army Guard" once per turn. You can activate the effects of your "Meklord" monsters that would target 1 Synchro Monster your opponent controls targeting this card in your GY instead. While this card is equipped to a "Meklord Emperor" monster, if that monster would be destroyed, you can destroy 1 card equipped to it, instead.
1169463.name: Meklord Army Guard

1169453.effect:
If this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can destroy 1 "Meklord" card in your Deck. You can only use this effect of "Meklord Army Top" once per turn. You can activate the effects of your "Meklord" monsters that would target 1 Synchro Monster your opponent controls targeting this card in your GY instead. A "Meklord" monster equipped with this card gains the following effect: 
● Once per turn: You can equip this card with 1 "Meklord" card from your hand or GY.
1169453.name: Meklord Army Top

1168817.effect: Until the next End Phase, while you control exactly 1 "Meklord Emperor" or "Meklord Astro" monster, treat all monsters that are in the Extra Deck or that were Summoned from the Extra Deck as Synchro Monsters for the effects of your "Meklord" cards, also the effects of such monsters cannot be activated in response to the activation of its effects. You can target 1 card you control; add this card from your GY to your hand, then destroy that card. You can only use this effect of "Meklord Protocol Update" once per turn.
1168817.name: Meklord Protocol Update

1169445.effect: You can activate the effects of "Meklord Emperor" and "Meklord Astro" monsters you control as Quick Effects until the next End Phase. If this card is sent to the GY: You can destroy 1 "Meklord" card you control, and if you do, Special Summon 1 "Meklord" monster with a different name from your Deck. You can only activate this effect of "Meklord Quickboot" once per turn.
1169445.name: Meklord Quickboot

1169470.effect: When your opponent activates a Normal Spell/Trap Card OR when your opponent activates a card effect while you control less monsters than your opponent and the only monster you control is a "Meklord" monster, the activated effect becomes "destroy 1 card your opponent controls". You can only activate 1 "Meklord Terminal Directive" per turn.
1169470.name: Meklord Terminal Directive

1956764.effect: If another card in your hand is banished, sent to the GY or shuffled into the Deck by an opponent's card: You can reveal this card in your hand; send it to the GY, and if you do, draw 3 cards. If this card in your hand is banished, sent to the GY or shuffled into the Deck by an opponent's card or effect: You can add 1 card from your Deck to your hand. You can only use each effect of "Parasite of the Mind" once per turn.
1956764.name: Parasite of the Mind

1956880.effect: Banish 10 cards from the top of your Deck face-down then target 1 card your opponent controls; destroy it. You can only activate 1 "Destructive Desire" per turn
1956880.name: Destructive Desire

1956727.effect: For your next normal draw in your Draw Phase, draw 3 cards, instead of drawing 1 card.
1956727.name: Gathering Magic

1894465.effect: Send N cards from your hand to the GY (min. 1); Until the end of the next turn, monsters currently on your opponent's field cannot activate their effects as Chain Link N or lower. Monsters on the field cannot activate their effects as Chain Link N or lower in the same Chain as this card (N = any number). You can only activate 1 "Electrostatic Resonance" per turn.
1894465.name: Electrostatic Resonance

1891151.effect: (This card is always treated as an "Electrostatic" card)Send N cards from your hand to the GY (min. 1); negate the effects of up to N monsters your opponent controls, and if you do, destroy them (N = any number). You can only activate 1 "Electrodominance" per turn.
1891151.name: Electrodominance

1891198.effect: Send N cards from your hand to the GY (min.1); Until the end of the next turn, you can use up to N Normal Spells as if they were Quick-Play Spells (N = any number). You can only activate 1 "Electrostatic Overcharge" per turn.
1891198.name: Electrostatic Overcharge

1956998.effect: Target up to 2 cards on the field; banish them. At the end of the next turn, you lose the Duel. You can only activate 1 "Inevitable Degeneration" per turn.
1956998.name: Inevitable Degeneration

1956938.effect: Look at your opponent's Extra Deck, and if you do, banish 1 card from it face-down.
1956938.name: Desolation of the Mind

1956889.effect: Target 1 card your opponent controls; destroy it. Until the end of your next turn after this card resolves, any card sent to your GY is banished face-down instead. You can only activate 1 "Shadow of the Reaper" per turn.
1956889.name: Shadow of the Reaper

1956894.effect: Target 1 card your opponent controls; destroy it, also skip your next Draw Phase. You can only activate 1 "Blessings of the Doomed" per turn.
1956894.name: Blessings of the Doomed

1947069.effect: A relic uncovered near the location of the first mysterious Hieratic relic. It appears to react to the first relic in some strange way.
1947069.name: Hieratic Seal of the Sun Dragon Servant
1947069.treated_as: Hieratic Seal of the Sun Dragon Servant

1947024.effect: You can Tribute 1 monster from your hand or field; Special Summon this card from your hand or GY, but it cannot be used as material for a Fusion, Synchro, Xyz, or Link Summon, except for the Summon of a "Hieratic" monster. If this this card is Tributed: Special Summon 1 Dragon Normal Monster from your hand, Deck, or GY, and make its ATK and DEF 0. You can only use each effect of "Hieratic Dragon of Bast" once per turn.
1947024.name: Hieratic Dragon of Bast
1947024.pendulum_effect: You can banish this card; during your Main Phase this turn, you can Normal Summon 1 "Hieratic" monster in addition to your Normal Summon/Set (You can only gain this effect once per turn.)

1947047.effect: If this card is in your hand or GY: You can detach 1 material from 1 Dragon Xyz Monster you control; Special Summon this card, but banish it when it leaves the field. (Quick Effect): You can target 1 "Hieratic" monster you control; Tribute another "Hieratic" monster in your hand or on your field, and if you do, the targeted monster gains 1000 ATK. You can only use each effect of "Hieratic Dragon of Sekh" once per turn.
1947047.name: Hieratic Dragon of Sekh
1947047.pendulum_effect: If a "Hieratic" monster you control is Tributed: You can Special Summon this card from your Pendulum Zone. You can only use this effect of "Hieratic Dragon of Sekh" once per turn.

1946719.effect: If this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can Tribute 1 monster from your hand, and if you do, add 1 "Hieratic" monster from your Deck to your hand. You cannot Special Summon monsters the turn you activate this effect, except "Hieratic" monsters. If this this card is Tributed: Special Summon 1 Dragon Normal Monster from your hand, Deck, or GY, and make its ATK and DEF 0. You can only use each effect of "Hieratic Dragon of Heka" once per turn.
1946719.name: Hieratic Dragon of Heka

1944824.effect:
You can Ritual Summon this card with "Hieratic Awakening". If this card is Ritual Summoned: You can shuffle any number of "Hieratic" monsters from your GY into your Deck, and if you do, draw 1 card for every 3 cards shuffled into the Deck by this effect. You can Tribute a "Hieratic" monster or Spell/Trap you control; activate the following effect based on what you Tributed.
●Monster: Set 1 Spell/Trap from your GY to your field.
●Spell/Trap: Special Summon 1 "Hieratic" monster from your GY but its ATK and DEF become 0.
You can only use each effect of "Hieratic Dragon Priest of Anub" once per turn.
1944824.name: Hieratic Dragon Priest of Anub

1944808.effect: This card is used to Ritual Summon "Hieratic Dragon Priest of Anub". You must also Tribute monsters from your hand or field whose total Levels equal or exceed the Level of the Ritual Monster you Ritual Summon. You can banish this card from your GY: Add 1 "Hieratic" card from your face-up Extra Deck or GY to your hand, also you cannot Special Summon monsters for the rest of this turn, except "Hieratic" monsters. You can only use this effect of "Hieratic Awakening" once per turn.
1944808.name: Hieratic Awakening

1944751.effect: Tribute 1 Effect Monster, then target 1 Effect Monster your opponent controls; send it to the GY, then Special Summon 1 Level 6 or higher Normal Monster from your hand or Deck. You can only activate 1 "Hieratic Seal Relase" per turn. You can only attack with 1 monster during the turn you activate this effect. You can banish this card from your GY, then target 1 "Hieratic" monster you control; it gains 400 ATK and DEF for every Normal Monster on your field and in your GY. You can only use each effect of "Hieratic of Seal Release" once per turn.
1944751.name: Hieratic Seal of Release

1944713.effect: If a "Hieratic" monster is Tributed: You can add 1 "Hieratic" monster from your GY with a different name from that Tributed monster. You can reveal 1 Normal Monster in your hand; Special Summon 1 "Hieratic" monster from your hand. You can only use each effect of "Hieratic Sphere Shrine" once per turn. Your opponent cannot target face-up monsters with 0 ATK or DEF for attacks.
1944713.name: Hieratic Shrine to The Spheres

1947122.effect:
Once per turn: You can target 1 "Hieratic" Xyz Monster you control; attach 1 "Hieratic" monster that is banished or in your GY to it as material. "Hieratic" Xyz Monsters you control that have a Normal Monster(s) attached to them as material gain this effect.
● Once per turn, when your opponent activates a monster effect in the hand (Quick Effect): You can detach 1 material from this card; negate the activation, and if you do, destroy it.
1947122.name: Hieratic Seal of Divine Dominion

1944778.effect:
2 Level 6 Dragon monsters
If a monster you control is Tributed: You can draw 1 card. (Quick Effect): You can detach 1 material from this card or Tribute 1 monster you control; destroy 1 card your opponent controls, and if you Tributed a monster to activate this effect, banish that destroyed card. You can only use each effect of "Hieratic Dragon King of Hor" once per turn.
1944778.name: Hieratic Dragon King of Hor

1949247.effect:
2 Level 5 Dragons
You can also Xyz Summon this card by using a "Hieratic" Normal Monster you control as material. You can detach 1 materials from this card, then apply the following effect(s) depending on what was detached.
●Normal Monster: Banish 1 monster from your opponent's GY.
●Effect Monster: You can target 1 Set card in your opponent's Spell & Trap Zone; while this card is in the Field Zone, that Set card cannot be activated until the End Phase, and your opponent must activate it during the End Phase or else send it to the GY.
You can only use each effect of "Hieratic Dragon Prince of Thoth" once per turn.
1949247.name: Hieratic Dragon Prince of Thoth

1216140.effect: If this card is targeted by an effect: You can Special Summon 1 level 4 or lower "Blackclaw" monster from your Deck in Defense Position, exept "Blackclaw - Cyles the New Born". If this card is in your GY: You can target 1 face-up card on the field ; Place 1 Blackclaw Counter on the target, and if you do, Special Summon this card from your GY. You can only use each effects of "Blackclaw - Cyles the New Born" once per turn.
1216140.name: Blackclaw - Cyles the New Born

1218681.effect: If this card is targeted by an effect: You can draw 1 card. Cannot be Special Summoned, exept by a "Blackclaw" monster's effect. Once per turn: You can target 1 Level 4 or lower "Blackclaw" non-Tuner Monster you control ; Place 1 Blackclaw Counter on the target, and if you do, increase or descrase its Level by 1 or 2. You can only use each effect of "Blackclaw - Iris the Queen's Equerry" once per turn.
1218681.name: Blackclaw - Iris the Queen's Equerry

1218637.effect: If this card is targeted by an effect: You can target 1 face-down card your opponent controls; return the target to the hand. If you control a "Blackclaw" monster other than "Blackclaw - Lola the Ocean Traveller": You can target 1 face-up card on the field ; Place 1 Blackclaw Counter on the target, and if you do, Special Summon this card from your hand. You can only use each effects of "Blackclaw - Lola the Ocean Traveller" once per turn.
1218637.name: Blackclaw - Lola the Ocean Traveller

1218172.effect: If this card is targeted by an effect: You can add 1 "Blackclaw" card from your Deck, exept "Blackclaw - Clara the Concubine". If you control a "Blackclaw" monster other than "Blackclaw - Clara the Concubine": You can target 1 face-up card on the field ; Place 1 Blackclaw Counter on the target, and if you do, Special Summon this card from your hand. You can only use each effects of "Blackclaw - Clara the Concubine" once per turn.
1218172.name: Blackclaw - Clara the Concubine

1218579.effect: If this card is targeted by an effect: You can target 1 Level 4 or lower "Blackclaw" monster in your GY, exept "Blackclaw - Katie the Flowery Gunner"; Special Summon that target in Defense Position. If you control a "Blackclaw" monster other than "Blackclaw - Katie the Flowery Gunner": You can target 1 face-up card on the field ; Place 1 Blackclaw Counter on the target, and if you do, Special Summon this card from your hand. You can only use each effects of "Blackclaw - Katie the Flowery Gunner" once per turn.
1218579.name: Blackclaw - Katie the Flowery Gunner

1218310.effect: If this card is targeted by an effect: You can target 1 face-up card your opponent controls; return the target to the hand. If you control a "Blackclaw" monster other than "Blackclaw - Paula the Swordman": You can target 1 face-up card on the field ; Place 1 Blackclaw Counter on the target, and if you do, Special Summon this card from your hand. You can only use each effects of "Blackclaw - Paula the Burning Swordman" once per turn.
1218310.name: Blackclaw - Paula the Burning Swordman

1218727.effect: If this card is targeted by an effect: You can send 1 "Blackclaw" monster from your Deck to the GY, exept "Blackclaw - Shadow the Moonlight Assassin". If you have no Tuner Monster on your GY: You can Special Summon this card (from your hand). During either player's turn, except the turn this card has been sent to the GY, you can banish this card and 1 "Blackclaw" Tuner from your GY : target 2 face-up "Blackclaw" cards you control; Place 1 Blackclaw Counter on each targets. You can only use each effect of "Blackclaw - Shadow the Moonlight Assassin" once per turn.
1218727.name: Blackclaw - Shadow the Moonlight Assassin

1218399.effect: Remove 2 Blackclaw Counters on the field; draw 2 cards. During the End Phase, if you have activated this card previously this turn: Change all Attack Position "Blackclaw" monsters you control to Defense Position. You can only activate 1 "Blackclaws Pet" per turn.
1218399.name: Blackclaws Pet

1218342.effect: When a "Blackclaw" monster is Normal Summoned to your side of the field: You can add 1 "Blackclaw" monster from your Deck wit a highter ATK to your hand. If this card is targeted by an effect: You can add 1 "Blackclaw" Spell/Trap Card from your Deck to your hand, except "Blackclaws Bath". You can only use each effects of "Blackclaws Bath" once per turn.
1218342.name: Blackclaws Bath

1218209.effect: All "Blackclaw" monsters on your field gain 100 ATK/DEF for each Blackclaw Counter on the field. All face-up "Blackclaw" monsters you control are unaffected by effects who targets them, exept "Blackclaw" card's effects. If this card is targeted by an effect: You can add 1 Level 4 or lower "Blackclaw" monsters from your Deck, with a different name than the cards you control and in your GY. If it was a "Blackclaw" card's effect, you can shuffle 1 card in your hand in your Deck and draw 1 card. You can only use this effect of "Blackclaws Neko Village" once per turn.
1218209.name: Blackclaws Neko Village

1218423.effect:
Activate 1 of these effects, also, after that, Set this card face-down instead of sending it to the GY. You can only use 1 of followings effects of "Blackclaws Rest" once per turn.
● if a face-up "Blackclaw" monster you control is destroyed by battle, or leaves the field because of an opponent's card effect; gain LP equal to that monster's original DEF, and if you do, shuffle it into the Deck.
● Target 1 face-up "Blackclaw" monster on the field; that target is unaffected by card effects this turn, except "Blackclaw" card's effects.
● Target 1 face-up "Blackclaw" monster on the field; ATK/DEF target's become equal to its combined original ATK and DEF until the end of this turn, and if the target is in Attack Position at the End Phase, change the target in Defense Position.
1218423.name: Blackclaws Rest

1218767.effect: If you control a "Blackclaw" monster: Target Set cards in your opponent's field, up to the number of "Blackclaw" monsters you control; destroy them. If you control min. 2 "Blackclaw" Synchro Monsters, you can activate this card from your hand.
1218767.name: Blackclaws Epiphany

1220056.effect: 1 "Blackclaw" Tuner + 1 non-Tuner Beast-Warrior Type monsterYou can also Synchro Summon this card by using 2 "Blackclaw" Tuners. If this card is Synchro Summoned using 2 "Blackclaw" monsters as Material, you can treated this card as a Tuner monster while face-up on the field. This card gains 200 ATK for each "Blackclaw" monster in your GY. If this card is targeted by an opponent's effect: You can add 1 "Blackclaw" Spell/Trap Card from your Deck to your hand. When this card is destroyed and sent to the GY: You can target 1 "Blackclaw" monster in your GY, except Synchro Monster; Special Summon it.
1220056.name: Elite Blackclaw - Exila the Moon Spirit
1220056.treated_as: Elite Blackclaw - Exila the Moon Spirit

1219329.effect:
1 "Blackclaw" Tuner + 1 non-Tuner Beast-Warrior Type monster
If this card is Synchro Summoned: Inflict 300 damage to your opponent for each Blackclaw Counter on the field, then you can target 1 face-up monster your opponent controls; that target loses ATK and DEF egal of the damage. You can only use this effect of "Elite Blackclaw - Quiaris the Sound of the Storm" once per turn. If this card is targeted by an effect: Inflict 500 damage to your opponent. During your Main Phase, you can Normal Summon 1 "Blackclaw" monster in addition to your Normal Summon/Set. (You can only gain this effect once per turn.)
1219329.name: Elite Blackclaw - Quiaris the Sound of the Storm
1219329.treated_as: Elite Blackclaw - Quiaris the Sound of the Storm

1219349.effect:
1 "Blackclaw" Tuner + 1 non-Tuner Beast-Warrior Type monster
If this card is Synchro Summoned: You can target 1 "Blackclaw" Synchro Monster in your Graveyard, exept "Elite Blackclaw - Megana the Host of the Nightmare"; Special Summon it. If this card is targeted by an opponent's effect: negate the effect. During either player's turn, when your opponent activates a card or effect that targets an other face-up card on your field, or when your opponent targets an other "Blackclaw" monster for an attack: That card/effect/attack now targets this card. You can only use each effect of "Elite Blackclaw - Megana the Host of the Nightmare" once per turn.
1219349.name: Elite Blackclaw - Megana the Host of the Nightmare
1219349.treated_as: Elite Blackclaw - Megana the Host of the Nightmare

1302824.effect: 1 "Blackclaw" Tuner + 1 non-Tuner Beast-Warrior Type monsterMust be Synchro Summoned, and cannot be Special Summoned by other ways. You can only control 1 face-up "Legendary Blackclaw - Cyles the Forgotten Member". If this card is Synchro Summoned: Place 2 Blackclaw Counter on this card. If this Synchro Summoned card is targeted by an effect, remove 1 Blackclaw Counter from this card: your opponent can only Special Summon 2 monsters from the Extra Deck for the rest of this turn (even if this card leaves the field). You can target cards your opponent controls, up to the number of other "Blackclaw" Synchro Monsters you control; destroy them. You can only use each effect of "Legendary Blackclaw - Cyles the Forgotten Member" once per turn.
1302824.name: Legendary Blackclaw - Cyles the Forgotten Member
1302824.treated_as: Legendary Blackclaw - Cyles the Forgotten Member

1219428.effect:
1 or more "Blackclaw" Tuners + 1 non-Tuner Beast-Warrior Type monster
Must be Synchro Summoned, and cannot be Special Summoned by other ways. You can only control 1 face-up "Legendary Blackclaw - Phallis the Queen of the Clan". Your opponent cannot target this card you control with card effects. As long as this card remains face-up on the field, your opponent cannot target card on his field.
1219428.name: Legendary Blackclaw - Phallis the Queen of the Clan
1219428.treated_as: Legendary Blackclaw - Phallis the Queen of the Clan

1221838.effect: 1 or more "Blackclaw" Tuners + 1 non-Tuner Beast-Warrior Type monsterMust be Synchro Summoned, and cannot be Special Summoned by other ways. You can only control 1 face-up "Legendary Blackclaw - Uldula Origin of the Lighting". If this card is Synchro Summoned: Until the end of the next turn, all face-up "Blackclaw" Synchro Monsters cannot be destroyed by battle or card effect. Once per turn, when another monster's effect is activated (Quick Effect): You can negate the activation, and if you do, destroy it, and if you do that, you can add 1 "Blackclaw" monster from your Deck to your hand with less ATK than that monster.
1221838.name: Legendary Blackclaw - Uldula Origin of the Lighting
1221838.treated_as: Legendary Blackclaw - Uldula Origin of the Lighting

1219456.effect:
1 "Blackclaw" Tuner + 1 non-Tuner Beast-Warrior Type Synchro Monster
Must be Synchro Summoned, and cannot be Special Summoned by other ways. You can only control 1 face-up "Legendary Blackclaw - Angelica the Light from Heaven". This face-up card on the field cannot be Tributed, or used as Fusion Material. You can banish 1 "Blackclaw" monster from your GY, then target 1 monster your opponent controls; banish it. If this Synchro Summoned card in its owner's control is destroyed by an opponent's card: You can Special Summon 1 "Blackclaw" Synchro Monster with 3000 or less ATK from your Extra Deck. (This is treated as a Synchro Summon.) You can only use this effect of "Legendary Blackclaw - Angelica the Light from Heaven" once per turn.
1219456.name: Legendary Blackclaw - Angelica the Light from Heaven
1219456.treated_as: Legendary Blackclaw - Angelica the Light from Heaven
